thread.title: An FBI Raid Puts the Spotlight on ‘Fixer’

author: Ben Zimmer
title: An FBI Raid Puts the Spotlight on ‘Fixer’
text:
In press accounts of Donald Trump’s personal lawyer Michael D. Cohen, whose office, home and hotel room were raided by FBI agents earlier this week, one word has come up again and again to label him: “fixer.”
A Wall Street Journal article from January 2017 set the trend with the headline, “Intelligence Dossier Puts Longtime Trump Fixer in Spotlight.” Mr. Cohen said of his relationship with Mr. Trump, “I am the fix-it guy. Anything that he needs to be done, any issues that concern him, I handle.”
